name: Xayah Lost in Space
description:
Description

One rainy morning Xayah the Dog was playing around in the puddles outside her home, when suddenly, she heard a noise. A giant spaceship has landed in the backyard behind her, curious Xayah went to investigate the strange object. The spaceship door opened, and floating inside was Xayah’s favorite treat, a bone! Xayah ran to the bone and the spaceship door slammed shut.

She could hear the manic laughter of her arch nemesis - Dr Purrsi. He

has trapped her in a giant spaceship and has launched her to outer space!

Fast forward into space, it is your job to keep her safe on her journey home.

 

Xayah Lost in Space is an endless runner game. Help navigate Xayah through space by using the mouse buttons to jetpack up and down.

(Use the ESC key to pause game while game is running)

Collect bones along the way to increase the score, but watch out for meteors, evil cats and giant laser beams trying to stop Xayah from collecting her bones!

Power ups will help Xayah in her journey through space - Shields will protect her in tough situations, the floating skulls will help by destroying all obstacles in her path and do not forget about collecting the double points powerup!
